titles.title: Gabriel Rosenberg Dyspraxia/DCD Coverage Act
Gabriel Rosenberg Dyspraxia/DCD Coverage Act
To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on insurance coverage of dyspraxia/developmental coordination disorder.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
